name: Dice Game (itch) (Pseudo)
description:
You're a contestant on the amazing Dice Game!!! Play through six fun and exciting levels, and if you survi...WIN, you will be forever immortalized as a Dice Game champion!

-------------------------------Controls-----------------------------

WASD/Arrow Keys - Movement

E - Interact

M - Mute All

R - Restart

---------------------------------------------------------------------

Note: This game was initially designed for the GMTK 2022 game jam, but I missed the deadline and decided to work on it a bit longer. I hope you enjoy it!!!
